General.Name: Byggmax Group AB (publ)
General.Description: Byggmax Group AB (publ) sells building materials and related products for DIY projects in Sweden, Norway, and internationally. The company offers timber, board materials, garden products, tools, paint, and other products. The company also offers its products online. Byggmax Group AB (publ) was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Solna, Sweden.
